original_text: Jesus said, ‘I will talk to you about the people who are alive today. They are like children who are sitting in the market place. They are playing games and they shout to other children,
korean_text: 이 세대를 무엇으로 비유할까 비유하건대 아이들이 장터에 앉아 제 동무를 불러

sentences.original_text: I will talk to you about the people who are alive today
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 오늘 살아있는 사람들에 대해 너희에게 말하겠다

sentences.original_text: They are like children who are sitting in the market place
and they shout to other children
